root.name: Eragon
root.description: OverviewEragon is an action/RPG for the Nintendo DS, based on the Eragon film license and developed by Griptonite Games. While Amaze's previous Eragon game for the Game Boy Advance was a 2D RPG featuring a party of characters in addition to Eragon, the Nintendo DS release is a solo adventure through a 3D RPG that has been compared to a scaled down Oblivion-like game.
